title: Dark Room Etiquette
description: Sixteen-year-old Sayers Wayte has everythingâ€”until he's kidnapped by a man who tells him his whole life has been a lie.Trapped in a windowless room, without knowing why he's been taken or how long the man plans to keep him shut away, Sayers faces a terrifying new reality. To survive, he must forget the world he once knew, and play the part his abductor has created for him. But as time passes, the line between fact and fiction starts to blur, and Sayers begins to wonder if he can escape . . . before he loses himself.
author: Robin Roe
